title: Aditya Institute of Technology and Management Tekkali: Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Reviews, Placement

Section.name: About AITAM
Section.description:
AITAM was established in the year 2001and is affiliated to JNTUK Kakinada. The Institute is accredited by NAAC and approved by UGC, AICTE, and NBA. The Institute offers UG, PG and Diploma courses in numerous specializations.
Admission to all the courses is done based on marks obtained in the Entrance Examination. The Institute also offers good placement opportunities to students of different streams. The Institute was ranked at #77 position by outlook among top private Colleges in India. It was also ranked at #4 position in Andhra Pradesh by Times of India.
Table of Content
Tabulated below are few facts about the Institute that interested candidates can check.
The Institute offers UG, PG and Diploma Courses under science stream. Tabulated below are details about their duration, eligibility and selection criteria.

Tech courses is based on marks obtained in PGECET, and admission to MBA course is done based on marks obtained in APICET.

faqs.question: Ques. What are the documents required at the time of admission at AITAM?
faqs.answer: The documents that are required during the admission procedure are 10th Standard Mark sheet, Caste Certificate, Passport Size Photo, Mark sheet of all semesters for PG courses, Entrance Examination scorecard.

faqs.question: Does AITAM provide placement opportunities for students?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, the Institute has a dedicated placement cell where every year top recruiting companies visit the campus for selecting students. Some of the names of eminent recruiters who had visited the campus are TCS Code Vita, TCS Ninja, Mindtree, Aptroid, HCL Technologies, Cognizant and WIPRO.

faqs.question: Ques. Does AITAM offer any co-curricular activities?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, the Institute offers multiple co-curricular activities like an NSS cell and an NCC cell. They also provide multiple sporting facilities such as a cricket field, football field and a basketball court.

faqs.question: Ques. Does AITAM offer sports and cultural activities to students?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, the Institute provide sports and cultural activities to students to keep them fit and healthy. The Institute has 1 cricket field, 1 football field, 1 handball court, 1 kho kho court, 1 volleyball court, 1 shuttle and badminton, 1 ball badminton court, 1 gym, 2 table tennis tables, 1 basket ball court, 2 throwball for women, and 2 tennisball court.

faqs.question: Does AITAM provide transport facilities to students?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, the Institute has the transport facility for the students too located at distant places. Many buses run on different routes and information regarding the bus no, driver name along with contact number candidates can check on the Institute’s official website.
